Body: i am working on a project for garbage monitoring system , i want to develop the hardware using nodemcu rather than arduino . i have searched a-lot on google but didn't find the circuit diagram.
You may not get the exact circuit for your requirement. Get the nodmcu pin out diagram ,find a suitable sensor for the requirement, design a circuit, measure input, get data uploaded for processing.

column9: you'll likely get the diagrams you're looking for.	There are multiple versions of the NodeMCU
column10:
so be sure to note that when searching. Here's the pinout for one of more popular the versions. https://bennthomsen.files.wordpress.com/2015/12/nodemcu_pinout_700-2.png

The NodeMCU uses the ESP8266 chip
column11:
so the instructions you find for the ESP8266 will apply.

Also
column12: if you are just getting started
column13: you should be aware that the ESP8266 has some security issues (anyone can just read your code
column14:
and hence your wifi password off of the device). The ESP32 is a nice alternative without the same security flaw.

"
